name: Enigma (itch) (Chyrro)
description:
This game has been made for the Weekly Game Jam #105 which theme is Cheat To Win. It is also the first Game Jam I take part in.

You are teleported in a strange room, without knowing why you are there, and then are welcomed by a mysterious talking door, Minako, letting you know that the only way to escape this place is by solving its enigma.

Will you find the solution or stay with Minako forever?

If you can't find the solution, here is a tip. Minako's name is similar to a famous Japanese company which created the Castlevania franchise and which is also known for the password present in its games. This code will lead you to your freedom.
